p: Of the 52 medicinal herbs, six were associated with two skincare functions: Schisandrae Fructus with hydration and tonification, Massa Medicata Fermentata with whitening and tonification, Amomi Tsao-ko Fructus with whitening and anti-inflammation, Atractylodis Rhizoma Alba and Aconiti Lateralis Radix Preparata with anti-inflammation and tonification, and Ginseng Radix with anti-aging and tonification.
